goal: Create compact equipment UI for dungeon milestone - no scrolling between slots and inventory, add item type icons, enable lobby integration

sessions.task: Implement compact side-by-side Equipment UI layout
sessions.notes: Redesigned Equipment.tsx: side-by-side layout (slots left, inventory right), compact slot rows with icons, item type icons (weapon/armor/shield), visual highlighting on selection, compact stats footer. CI passes.

next_steps: Manual test: verify no-scroll layout works
